name: Gladiator Game (InsertNormality)
description:
Developed as part of a team for the Derby Computing Society's Feburary 24hr Game Jam. This jam had the theme of History and the idea behind the game was for you to be a gladiator fighting waves of enemies.

Programmer/Team Lead: Jake Yeatman

AI Programmer: Joshua Lightfoot

Programmer: Ryan Doyle

Character Art : Lewis Boulden (Show Reel)

Environment Art: Daniel Berrystone (LinkedIn)

There are a couple other but I forget their names (sorry).
